short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks the confirmation dialog which sometimes appears when navigating from a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upcoming features:
* Option to choose where to block them
* Option to replace with non-intrusive version

Requested by reddit user redditgizmos.
